General.Name: Well Told Company Inc
General.Description: The Well Told Company Inc., a wellness company, develops, distributes, and sells various plant-based supplements, remedies, and other functional wellness products in Canada. It also sells its products through welltold.com and third-party e-commerce platforms. The company is headquartered in Toronto, Canada.
General.Address: 99 Yorkville Avenue, Toronto, ON, Canada, M5R 3K5

2.Name: Ms. Betty Au Yeung CPA, CGMA
2.Title: CFO & Corp. Sec.
